A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Too light a film and has gone a galaxy far far away from the originals that were darker and had more depth. From the opening joke phone call like banter direct to the general. This was aimed as Disney films are\, the younger audience....we now even have a cute toy I am sure.

I left the cinema thinking "what was the point of this" I hoped with the return of Luke this was going to be back to the greats.
Average at best
